pages.title: Atlantic Football Fish
pages.text: Himantolophus groenlandicus, the Atlantic footballfish or Atlantic football-fish, is an anglerfish found primarily in mesopelagic depths of the ocean.$(br2)Despite its name, this species might not be restricted to the Atlantic Ocean, with its range possibly extending into the Indian Ocean and to the Pacific Ocean.

pages.title: Atlantic Football Fish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)4 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
